caption.title: Contribution of sexual transmission to the overall reproductive number.
caption.p: The relative contribution of R 0, C to the overall reproductive number increases over the course of the epidemic, as the non-sexual transmission rate falls due to the implementation of control measures and as the number of susceptible individuals declines. The dashed line indicates the day control measures were implemented (Ï„ = 51 days after the index case).
Click here for additional data file.
